name: Souls-like game (tranxuantu104)
description:
An action game similar to Dark Souls. In this game, the player is equipped with a variety of weapons. There are different types of attacks.

The player uses the mouse to move the camera.

Press Y to change from one-handed sword to two-handed sword.

Press T to lock the target

Attack Combo when using sword:

• Press E twice for Light Attack combo

• Press R 2 times for Heavy Attack combo

• Run + E to perform Running Attack

• Run + R to perform Jumping Attack

• When standing behind enemy Hold E to perform assassination

• Hold R to perform Charge Attack

Use shield in left hand:

• Hold Q to perform defensive moves

• Press Z to counter enemy attacks

Using bows:

• Press Y to switch to bow position

• Hold E to raise and pull the bow

• Press E for archery

• Hold Q to enter aim mode
